mapper.sql: id, permission_name, permission_desc, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT eps_permission.id AS id, eps_permission.permission_name AS permission_name, eps_permission.permission_desc AS permission_desc, eps_permission.is_deleted AS is_deleted, eps_permission.gmt_create AS gmt_create, eps_permission.gmt_modified AS gmt_modified FROM electricity_prediction.eps_role_permission_relation LEFT JOIN electricity_prediction.eps_permission ON eps_role_permission_relation.permission_id = eps_permission.id WHERE eps_role_permission_relation.role_id = #{userId}
